From Now On
Hugh Jackman, The Greatest Showman 


I saw the sun begin to dim
And felt that winter wind
Blow cold
A man learns who is there for him
When the glitter fades and the walls won't hold
'Cause from then, rubble

Can only be what's true
If all was lost
Is more I gain
'Cause it led me back
To you
From now on
These eyes will not be blinded by the lights

Tonight

Like an anthem in my heart
From now on
From now on

Hugh Jackman, Jeremy Jordan, Keala Settle, Cynthia Erivo, Carrie Manolakos, Andrew Keenan Bolger, Tamika Lawrence, and Natalie Weiss with Justin Paul on keys? I want to be in the room where that happened.

I am ashamed to say I didnâ€™t give this film much thought on its release (and darn it all, Iâ€™m a musician!), because the marketing was not very strong and Iâ€™d heard nothing good from the critics. My wife, two days ago, showed me the â€œThis Is Meâ€ scene, and then we found THIS video together on YT. I immediately purchased the Soundtrack and we are going as a family to see it in the theatre tomorrow, even though itâ€™s hitting digital in 10 days. I want to support artistry and artists like this as much as possible, and Iâ€™m glad that Iâ€™ll have a chance to see it on the big screen as intended. I have watched this video at least 20 times over the past few days, and suspect I will even more over the coming weeks until the Blu-Ray hits and I can watch even more of the workshop. This was so amazing, uplifting and life-affirming - and if we ever do discover life on other planets, I sure hope they have music as wonderful as this! ðŸ˜ƒ
